roleset.name: decline

example.name: this really does occur
example.text: The average seven-day compound yield of the 400 taxable funds tracked by IBC's Money Fund Report eased a fraction of a percentage point to 8.45% from 8.47% for the week ended Tuesday.
example.arg: The average seven-day compound yield of the 400 taxable funds tracked by IBC's Money Fund Report
a fraction of a percentage point

roleset.note: EASE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ease' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'fall' and 'help' (from ease.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: help, aid, ameliorate

example.name: transitive
example.text: A soft landing is an economic slowdown that *trace* eases inflation without leading to a recession.

roleset.note: EASE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ease' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'fall' and 'help' (from ease.02-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: slide, move easily

example.name: slip sliding away
example.text: Often judges ease into more lucrative private practice with little fanfare.

roleset.note: EASE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ease' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'fall' and 'help' (from ease.03-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: banks purchasing longer term assets to keep inflation up

role.descr: agent, monetary authority responsible for QE

example.name: argM
example.text: Inflation fell from 5.0 % to 4.8 % and the economy is still very poor so the road is open for more easing .

example.name: more argMs
example.text: Hello all . So there are rumors of further quantitative easing in the works .

example.name: arg1
example.text: The Federal Reserve announced on November 3, 2010, a second round of quantitative easing of $600 billion.

example.name: arg0
example.text: With US quantitative easing off the table for the time being, bullion remains below the $1600 level and continues to fight a bullish dollar.

roleset.note: EASING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5. (from easing.01-n)

Also called "quantitative easing", or "QE" for short. "QE1", "QE2", "QE3" and "QE-infinity" refer to specific instances of quantitative easing that began in the US on certain dates. (from easing.01-n)

roleset.name: become easier

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: In a highly unusual meeting in Sen. DeConcini 's office in April 1987 , the five senators asked federal regulators to ease up on Lincoln .

roleset.note: EASE_UP-V NOTES: I haven't seen this yet in WSJ, but it might occur. Similar to "help,aid, ameliorate" roleset above. (from ease.04-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: not difficult

role.descr: thing that is easy (may require concatenation)

example.name: empty it
example.text: Indeed , Judge O'Brien ruled that `` it would be easy to conclude that the USIA 's position is ` inappropriate or even stupid , ' '' but it 's the law .
example.arg: to conclude that the USIA 's position is ` inappropriate or even stupid , '
